description:
Killer is shocked to find out who Hawkins’ straw doll he slashed represents. Meanwhile, Sanji who is in a hard battle against Queen and King sees enemy brutes going after the injured Zoro, and no one else is there to save him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Spell! Kid and Zoro Facing Threats!
Der Bann! Gefahr im Verzug – Kid und Zorro!
Jubaku! Semaru Kyoui: Kid to Zoro!
Maléfice et menace imminente. Kidd et Zoro !
Заклинание! Киду и Зоро грозит опасность!
呪縛! 迫る脅威 キッドとゾロ!
